00028 class ImageFormat_SiemensTcpIp: public FileFormat

00032     std::string suffixes( isis::image_io::FileFormat::io_modes iomode )const {
00033         if ( write_only == iomode ) {
00034             return std::string();
00035         } else {
00036             return std::string( ".tcpip" );

00044     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00045 
00046 
00047         printf( "IMAGE: %d\n", image_counter );
00048 
00049         firstHeaderArrived = false;
00050         unsigned long data_received = 0L;
00051         std::string header_start = "<data_block_header>";
00052         std::string header_end =  "</data_block_header>";
00053         std::string session_terminus = "<series_finished>";
00054         unsigned int byteSize = 0;
00055         char *dataBuffer;
00056         std::string header;
00057 
00058         for( ;; ) {
00059             memset( buffer, 0, sizeof( buffer ) );
00060             unsigned int length = recvfrom( sock, buffer, sizeof( buffer ), 0, ( struct sockaddr * )&receiver_address, &receiver_address_length );
00061 
00062             if( length == 0 ) {
00063                 exit( 0 );
00064             }
00065 
00066             if ( memcmp( buffer, session_terminus.c_str(), session_terminus.size() - 1 ) == 0 ) {
00067                 return 0;
00068             }
00069 
00070 
00071             if( memcmp( buffer, header_start.c_str(), header_start.size() ) == 0 ) {
00072                 firstHeaderArrived = true;
00073                 data_received = 0L;
00074                 unsigned int header_length = 0;
00075 
00076                 while( memcmp( header_end.c_str(), ( buffer + header_length ), header_end.size() ) != 0 ) {
00077                     header_length++;
00078                 }
00079 
00080                 header_length += header_end.size();
00081                 header = std::string( buffer, header_length );
00082                 byteSize = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "data_size_in_bytes", header ).c_str() );
00083 
00084                 dataBuffer = ( char * )malloc( byteSize );
00085                 memset( dataBuffer, 0, byteSize );
00086 
00087                 // copy the first bit of data
00088                 memcpy( dataBuffer, ( buffer + header_length ), sizeof( buffer ) - header_length );
00089 
00090                 data_received += sizeof( buffer ) - header_length;
00091 
00092 
00093             } else if ( true == firstHeaderArrived ) {
00094 
00095                 if( byteSize - data_received >= 32768 ) {
00096                     memcpy( dataBuffer + data_received, buffer, sizeof( buffer ) );
00097                     data_received += sizeof( buffer );
00098 
00099                     printf( "dataRec: '%ld'\n", data_received );
00100                     printf( "   imageNR: %d \n", image_counter );
00101                 } else {
00102                     // image complete
00103 
00104                     // ... read out header for the data ...
00105                     /******************************/
00106 
00107                     size_t width = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "width", header ).c_str() );
00108                     bool moco = getStringFromHeader( "motion_corrected", header ).compare( "yes" ) == 0 ? true : false;
00109                     size_t height = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "height", header ).c_str() );
00110                     bool mosaic = getStringFromHeader( "mosaic", header ).compare( "yes" ) == 0 ? true : false;
00111 
00112                     // Mosaics have to be handled special
00113                     size_t iim = 1; //number of images in mosaic
00114                     size_t slices_in_row = 1;
00115                     size_t width_slice = width;
00116                     size_t height_slice = height;
00117 
00118                     if ( true == mosaic ) {
00119                         iim = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "images_in_mosaic", header ).c_str() );
00120                         slices_in_row = static_cast<size_t> ( ceil( sqrt( static_cast<double_t> ( iim ) ) ) );
00121                         // Mosaics are always quadratic, so don't bother 'bout only looking for the rows
00122                         width_slice = width / slices_in_row;
00123                         height_slice = height / slices_in_row;
00124                     }
00125 
00126                     std::string data_type = getStringFromHeader( "data_type", header );
00127 
00128                     size_t acq_nr = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "acquisition_number", header ).c_str() );
00129                     std::string seq_descr = getStringFromHeader( "sequence_description", header );
00130                     std::string subject_name = getStringFromHeader( "patient_name", header );
00131                     size_t subject_gender = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "patient_sex", header ).c_str() );
00132                     uint16_t seq_number = atol( getStringFromHeader( "meas_uid", header ).c_str() );
00133                     size_t acq_time = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "acquisition_time", header ).c_str() );
00134                     uint16_t rep_time = atol( getStringFromHeader( "repetition_time", header ).c_str() );
00135                     util::fvector4 read_vec = getVectorFromString( getStringFromHeader( "read_vector", header ) );
00136                     util::fvector4 phase_vec = getVectorFromString( getStringFromHeader( "phase_vector", header ) );
00137                     util::fvector4 slice_norm_vec = getVectorFromString( getStringFromHeader( "slice_norm_vector", header ) );
00138                     int16_t inplane_rot = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "inplane_rotation", header ).c_str() );
00139                     std::string slice_orient = getStringFromHeader( "slice_orientation", header );
00140 
00141                     //Fallunterscheidung
00142                     // Wenn ((slice_orient == TRANSVERSE) gilt: (-45 < inplane_rot < 45)) ? -> COL : ROW -> columnVec == col + rowVec == row
00143                     // Wenn ((slice_orient != TRANSVERSE) gilt: (-45 < inplane_rot < 45)) ? -> ROW : COL -> columnVec == row + rowVec == col
00144                     std::string InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection;
00145 
00146                     if ( 0 == slice_orient.compare( 0, slice_orient.length(), "TRANSVERSE" ) ) {
00147                         InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection = ( -45 < inplane_rot && inplane_rot < 45 ) ? "COL" : "ROW";
00148                     } else {
00149                         InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection = ( -45 < inplane_rot && inplane_rot < 45 ) ? "ROW" : "COL";
00150                     }
00151 
00152                     size_t fov_read = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "fov_read", header ).c_str() );
00153                     size_t fov_phase = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "fov_phase", header ).c_str() );
00154                     float slice_thickness = atof( getStringFromHeader( "slice_thickness", header ).c_str() );
00155                     size_t dimension_number = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "dimension_number", header ).c_str() );
00156                     // get voxelGap out of the distance (in percent!) between slices
00157                     size_t distFactor = atoi( getStringFromHeader( "distance_factor", header ).c_str() );
00158                     util::fvector4 voxelGap( 0, 0, slice_thickness * ( static_cast<float>( distFactor ) / 100.0 ) );
00159 
00160                     // ... copy the data ...
00161                     /******************************/
00162 
00163                     image_counter++;
00164 
00165                     memcpy( dataBuffer + data_received, buffer, byteSize - data_received );
00166                     data_received += byteSize - data_received;
00167 
00168 
00169                     // ... create a chunk from data ...
00170                     /******************************/
00171 
00172                     //divide for the data types
00173                     unsigned short tID = 0;
00174                     unsigned short tSize = 0;
00175 
00176                     if ( 0 == data_type.compare( "byte" ) ) {
00177                         tID = data::ValuePtr<uint8_t>::staticID;
00178                         tSize = sizeof( uint8_t );
00179 
00180                     } else if ( 0 == data_type.compare( "short" ) ) {
00181                         tID = data::ValuePtr<uint16_t>::staticID;
00182                         tSize = sizeof( uint16_t );
00183 
00184                     } else if ( 0 == data_type.compare( "long" ) ) {
00185                         tID = data::ValuePtr<uint32_t>::staticID;
00186                         tSize = sizeof( uint32_t );
00187 
00188                     } else if ( 0 == data_type.compare( "float" ) ) {
00189                         tID = data::ValuePtr<float>::staticID;
00190                         tSize = sizeof( float );
00191                     } else {
00192                         LOG( isis::image_io::Runtime, isis::error ) << "Retrieving data over TCP/IP with an unknown datatype: " << tID;
00193                         //TODO :REMOVE this
00194                         printf( "DATATYPE NOT SUPPORTED\n" );
00195                         free( dataBuffer );
00196 
00197                         return 0;
00198                     }
00199 
00200                     size_t size_to_alloc = iim * width_slice * height_slice;
00201                     isis::data::ValuePtrReference valPtrBuffer = isis::data::_internal::ValuePtrBase::createByID( tID, size_to_alloc );
00202 
00203                     for( unsigned int _slice = 0; _slice < iim; _slice++ ) {
00204                         for( unsigned int _row = 0; _row < height_slice; _row++ ) {
00205                             char *line_start = dataBuffer + ( tSize * ( ( ( _slice / slices_in_row ) * ( slices_in_row * height_slice * width_slice ) ) +
00206                                                               ( _row * width_slice * slices_in_row ) + ( _slice % slices_in_row * width_slice ) ) );
00207 
00208                             memcpy( valPtrBuffer->getRawAddress( ( _slice * width_slice * height_slice + _row * width_slice ) * tSize ).get(), line_start, ( width_slice * tSize ) );
00209                         }
00210                     }
00211 
00212                     /********
00213                      * get each slice position from header
00214                      */
00215                     std::string slice_pos = "slice_position_0";
00216                     util::fvector4 slice_pos_vec = getVectorFromString( getStringFromHeader( slice_pos, header ) ); //(val1, val2, val3);
00217                     //*********
00218 
00219                     // now, create a real chunk in memory and convert it to float data
00220                     data::Chunk myChunk( valPtrBuffer, width_slice, height_slice, iim );
00221                     myChunk.convertToType( isis::data::ValuePtr<float>::staticID );
00222 
00223                     // set all the general properties - i.e. feed the generated chunk with metadata
00224 
00225                     myChunk.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", slice_pos_vec );
00226                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", ( acq_nr ) );
00227                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "subjectName", subject_name );
00228                     isis::util::Selection isisGender( "male,female,other" );
00229 
00230                     if ( 1 == subject_gender ) {
00231                         isisGender.set( "male" );
00232                     } else if ( 2 == subject_gender ) {
00233                         isisGender.set( "female" );
00234                     } else {
00235                         isisGender.set( "other" );
00236                     }
00237 
00238                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<isis::util::Selection>( "subjectGender", isisGender );
00239 
00240                     //myChunk.setPropertyAs<>("acquisitionTime", acquisition_time);
00241                     if ( ( true == moco ) && ( true == mosaic ) ) {
00242                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", seq_number + 10000 ); // This is to make the sequenceNumber unique - so it's a nasty assumption there won't be more than 10000 scans in one session
00243                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "DICOM/ImageType", "MOCO\\WAS_MOSAIC" );
00244                     } else if ( true == mosaic ) {
00245                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", seq_number );
00246                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "DICOM/ImageType", "WAS_MOSAIC" );
00247                     } else {
00248                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", seq_number );
00249                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "DICOM/ImageType", "" );
00250                     }
00251 
00252                     seq_descr.append( "_rtMPISiemensExport" );
00253                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "sequenceDescription", seq_descr );
00254 
00255                     if ( 0 == InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection.compare( 0, 3, "COL" ) ) {
00256                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec", phase_vec );
00257                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec", read_vec );
00258                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( fov_read / width_slice, fov_phase / height_slice, slice_thickness, 0 ) );
00259                     } else {
00260                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec", phase_vec );
00261                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec", read_vec );
00262                         myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( fov_phase / width_slice, fov_read / height_slice, slice_thickness, 0 ) );
00263                     }
00264 
00265 
00266                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec", slice_norm_vec );
00267                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "repetitionTime", rep_time );
00268                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection", InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection );
00269                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap", util::fvector4() );
00270                     std::string sn = boost::posix_time::to_simple_string( boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::local_time() );
00271                     myChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "source", sn );
00272                     chunks.push_back( myChunk );
00273 
00274 
00275                     /******************************/
00276                     free( dataBuffer );
00277                     /*****************************/
00278 
00279 
00280                     return chunks.size();
00281                 }
00282 
00283             }
00284 
00285 
00286         }
00287 
00288         return 0;
00289     }

00313     std::string getStringFromHeader( const std::string &propName, const std::string &header ) {
00314 
00315         std::string prop_start = "<";
00316         prop_start.append( propName );
00317         prop_start.append( ">\n" );
00318         std::string prop_end = "\n</";
00319         prop_end.append( propName );
00320         prop_end.append( ">" );
00321         std::string propString = "";
00322 
00323         if ( std::string::npos != ( header.find( prop_start ) ) ) {
00324             propString = header.substr( ( header.find( prop_start ) + prop_start.length() ),
00325                                         header.find( prop_end ) - ( header.find( prop_start ) + prop_start.length() ) );
00326         }
00327 
00328         return propString;
00329     }
00330 
00331     util::fvector4 getVectorFromString( std::string propName ) {
00332         size_t indexK1 = propName.find( ",", 0, 1 );
00333         size_t indexK2 = propName.find( ",", indexK1 + 1, 1 );
00334         double_t val1 = atof( propName.substr( 0, indexK1 ).c_str() );
00335         double_t val2 = atof( propName.substr( indexK1 + 1, indexK2 - indexK1 ).c_str() );
00336         double_t val3 = atof( propName.substr( indexK2 + 1, propName.length() - indexK2 ).c_str() );
00337         return util::fvector4( val1, val2, val3 );
00338     }
00339     char   buffer[32768];

00352 isis::image_io::FileFormat *factory()
00353 {
00354     isis::image_io::ImageFormat_SiemensTcpIp *pluginRtExport = new isis::image_io::ImageFormat_SiemensTcpIp();
00355 
00356     pluginRtExport->sock = socket( PF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, IPPROTO_UDP );
00357     printf( "[receiver2] sock --> %i\n", pluginRtExport->sock );
00358 
00359     memset( ( void * )&pluginRtExport->receiver_address, 0, sizeof( pluginRtExport->receiver_address ) );
00360     pluginRtExport->receiver_address.sin_family      = PF_INET;
00361     pluginRtExport->receiver_address.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00362     pluginRtExport->receiver_address.sin_port        = htons( 54321 );
00363 
00364     printf( "[bind] --> %i\n", bind( pluginRtExport->sock, ( struct sockaddr * )&pluginRtExport->receiver_address, sizeof( pluginRtExport->receiver_address ) ) );
00365     pluginRtExport->receiver_address_length = sizeof( pluginRtExport->receiver_address );
00366     pluginRtExport->counter = 0;
00367     pluginRtExport->image_counter = 0;
00368 
00369     //Just a workaround to generate all the converters
00370     isis::data::MemChunk<int32_t> test( 2, 3, 4 );
00371     test.convertToType( isis::data::ValuePtr<float>::staticID );
00372     printf( "end of plugin load\n" );
00373     return ( isis::image_io::FileFormat * ) pluginRtExport;
00374 }
